details.excerpt: Simon provides digital consultation services in the areas of open data,social media and creative digital projects.He has a strong history of working with open government data. As well ashosting and attending a variety of hackathon events he has recentlyworked on AidView, an application which displays international aid datain an accessible manner.Simon has been involved in co-creating and running a number of informalevents such as the Hyper WM unconference and Brewcamp, a bi-monthlymeet-up for people interested in innovative uses of technology in localgovernment.He has a strong interest in encouraging and facilitating digitalinnovation in organisations and hosted the Hello Culture DevLab lastyear. This brought together digital developers and culturalorganisations for two days of support in developing new collaborativeprojects.
details.description:
Simon provides digital consultation services in the areas of open data,social media and creative digital projects.He has a strong history of working with open government data. As well ashosting and attending a variety of hackathon events he has recentlyworked on AidView, an application which displays international aid datain an accessible manner.Simon has been involved in co-creating and running a number of informalevents such as the Hyper WM unconference and Brewcamp, a bi-monthlymeet-up for people interested in innovative uses of technology in localgovernment.He has a strong interest in encouraging and facilitating digitalinnovation in organisations and hosted the Hello Culture DevLab lastyear. This brought together digital developers and culturalorganisations for two days of support in developing new collaborativeprojects.

 Contact details for me are

si@siwhitehouse.co.uk

http://siwhitehouse.co.uk

@siwhitehouse
